verses.verse: Now Benjamin<WH1144> begat<WH3205> Bela<WH1106> his firstborn,<WH1060> Ashbel<WH788> the second,<WH8145> and Aharah<WH315> the third,<WH7992>
Nohah<WH5119> the fourth,<WH7243> and Rapha<WH7498> the fifth.<WH2549>
And the sons<WH1121> of Bela<WH1106> were, Addar,<WH146> and Gera,<WH1617> and Abihud,<WH31>
And Abishua,<WH50> and Naaman,<WH5283> and Ahoah,<WH265>
And Gera,<WH1617> and Shephuphan,<WH8197> and Huram.<WH2361>

And these<WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Ehud:<WH261> these<WH428> <WH1992> are the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Geba,<WH1387> and they removed<WH1540> them to Manahath:<WH4506>
And Naaman,<WH5283> and Ahiah,<WH281> and Gera,<WH1617> he removed<WH1540> them, and begat<WH3205> Uzza,<WH5798> and Ahihud.<WH284>
And Shaharaim<WH7842> begat<WH3205> children in the country<WH7704> of Moab,<WH4124> after<WH4480> he had sent<WH7971> them away; Hushim<WH2366> and Baara<WH1199> were his wives.<WH802>
And he begat<WH3205> of Hodesh<WH2321> his wife,<WH802> Jobab,<WH3103> and Zibia,<WH6644> and Mesha,<WH4331> and Malcham,<WH4445>
And Jeuz,<WH3263> and Shachia,<WH7634> and Mirma.<WH4821> These<WH428> were his sons,<WH1121> heads<WH7218> of the fathers.<WH1>
And of Hushim<WH2366> he begat<WH3205> Abitub,<WH36> and Elpaal.<WH508>
The sons<WH1121> of Elpaal;<WH508> Eber,<WH5677> and Misham,<WH4936> and Shamed,<WH8106> who<WH1931> built<WH1129> Ono,<WH207> and Lod,<WH3850> with the towns<WH1323> thereof:

Beriah<WH1283> also, and Shema,<WH8087> who<WH1992> were heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Aijalon,<WH357> who<WH1992> drove<WH1272> away<WH1272> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gath:<WH1661>
And Ahio,<WH283> Shashak,<WH8349> and Jeremoth,<WH3406>
And Zebadiah,<WH2069> and Arad,<WH6166> and Ader,<WH5738>
And Michael,<WH4317> and Ispah,<WH3472> and Joha,<WH3109> the sons<WH1121> of Beriah;<WH1283>
And Zebadiah,<WH2069> and Meshullam,<WH4918> and Hezeki,<WH2395> and Heber,<WH2268>
Ishmerai<WH3461> also, and Jezliah,<WH3152> and Jobab,<WH3103> the sons<WH1121> of Elpaal;<WH508>
And Jakim,<WH3356> and Zichri,<WH2147> and Zabdi,<WH2067>
And Elienai,<WH462> and Zilthai,<WH6769> and Eliel,<WH447>
And Adaiah,<WH5718> and Beraiah,<WH1256> and Shimrath,<WH8119> the sons<WH1121> of Shimhi;<WH8096>
And Ishpan,<WH3473> and Heber,<WH5677> and Eliel,<WH447>
And Abdon,<WH5658> and Zichri,<WH2147> and Hanan,<WH2605>
And Hananiah,<WH2608> and Elam,<WH5867> and Antothijah,<WH6070>
And Iphedeiah,<WH3301> and Penuel,<WH6439> the sons<WH1121> of Shashak;<WH8349>
And Shamsherai,<WH8125> and Shehariah,<WH7841> and Athaliah,<WH6271>
And Jaresiah,<WH3298> and Eliah,<WH452> and Zichri,<WH2147> the sons<WH1121> of Jeroham.<WH3395>
These<WH428> were heads<WH7218> of the fathers,<WH1> by their generations,<WH8435> chief<WH7218> men. These<WH428> dwelled<WH3427> in Jerusalem.<WH3389>
And at Gibeon<WH1391> dwelled<WH3427> the father<WH25> of Gibeon;<WH25> whose wife's<WH802> name<WH8034> was Maachah:<WH4601>
And his firstborn<WH1060> son<WH1121> Abdon,<WH5658> and Zur,<WH6698> and Kish,<WH7027> and Baal,<WH1168> and Nadab,<WH5070>
And Gedor,<WH1446> and Ahio,<WH283> and Zacher.<WH2144>
And Mikloth<WH4732> begat<WH3205> Shimeah.<WH8039> And these<WH1992> also<WH637> dwelled<WH3427> with their brothers<WH251> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> over<WH5048> against<WH5048> them.

And Ner<WH5369> begat<WH3205> Kish,<WH7027> and Kish<WH7027> begat<WH3205> Saul,<WH7586> and Saul<WH7586> begat<WH3205> Jonathan,<WH3083> and Malchishua,<WH4444> and Abinadab,<WH41> and Eshbaal.<WH792>
And the son<WH1121> of Jonathan<WH3083> was Meribbaal;<WH4807> and Meribbaal<WH4807> begat<WH3205> Micah.<WH4318>
And the sons<WH1121> of Micah<WH4318> were, Pithon,<WH6377> and Melech,<WH4429> and Tarea,<WH8390> and Ahaz.<WH271>
And Ahaz<WH271> begat<WH3205> Jehoadah;<WH3085> and Jehoadah<WH3085> begat<WH3205> Alemeth,<WH5904> and Azmaveth,<WH5820> and Zimri;<WH2174> and Zimri<WH2174> begat<WH3205> Moza,<WH4162>
And Moza<WH4162> begat<WH3205> Binea:<WH1150> Rapha<WH7498> was his son,<WH1121> Eleasah<WH501> his son,<WH1121> Azel<WH682> his son:<WH1121>

And Azel<WH682> had six<WH8337> sons,<WH1121> whose names<WH8034> are these,<WH428> Azrikam,<WH5840> Bocheru,<WH1074> and Ishmael,<WH3458> and Sheariah,<WH8187> and Obadiah,<WH5662> and Hanan.<WH2605> All<WH3605> these<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Azel.<WH682>
And the sons<WH1121> of Eshek<WH6232> his brother<WH251> were, Ulam<WH198> his firstborn,<WH1060> Jehush<WH3266> the second,<WH8145> and Eliphelet<WH467> the third.<WH7992>

And the sons<WH1121> of Ulam<WH198> were mighty<WH1368> men<WH582> of valor,<WH2428> archers,<WH1869> <WH7198> and had many<WH7235> sons,<WH1121> and sons'<WH1121> sons,<WH1121> an hundred<WH3967> and fifty.<WH2572> All<WH3605> these<WH428> are of the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin.<WH1144>
